name: World Bowling
overview: A BOWLING ALLEY IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND With World Bowling, you can compete in a fun-filled competition in the finest bowling alleys of the world. Stops along the tour are Japan, China, the USA, Canada, France and England. Do you have what it takes to make the qualifying scores to stay on the world tour? World Bowling is a one or two player scratch bowling match. You can select your player, and the weight of your ball. With careful positioning, a nice hook, and the right amount of power, you can bowl your way around the world. With World Bowling, you can take the lanes with you.
